title: The sooting behavior of lactones as sustainable fuels
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00883A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zhanhong Xiang, Mehmet B. Acikel, Collin J. Hansen, Ga-Un Jeong, Raúl Pérez-Soto, David Z. Wang, Vivian C. Whoriskey, Seonah Kim, Charles S. McEnally, Lisa D. Pfefferle, Yuan Xuan
Quantitative sooting tendencies were measured for 10 lactones with a wide range of molecular structures. Lactones have potential as low-soot, sugar-derived alternative fuels.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
